title: Cape, 1810–20
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: discharge printed on plain weave
description: Woman's printed cotton cape, open down the front,  with a hood with a pleated ruffle all around. Fabric is dark indigo blue a discharged design in light blue, with touches of orange.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, 1810–20.
1810–20. Medium: cotton
Technique: discharge printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-239.
